title: Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster - 3 Packs 30 Feet Each Pre-Baited, Ready to Use Indoors & Outdoors. Bug Insect Infestation Sticky Adhesive Scented Green Color Barn Paper Sheet Disposable Non-Toxic
descriptions:
Introducing the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster - your ultimate solution to pesky bug and insect infestations! Each pack comes with 30 feet of pre-baited, ready-to-use sticky adhesive barn paper sheets in a vibrant green color. Not only is this trap effective for up to a full year, but it covers a whopping 3600 square inches, making it perfect for residential, commercial, industrial, barns, waste rooms, and animal farms.

With a non-toxic, disposable, and scented formula, this trap is suitable for both indoor and outdoor use, even in damp or humid conditions. Say goodbye to pests the intelligent way with our Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster. Don't let infestations take over - get yours today and experience the power of intelligent pest management!

Whether you're dealing with an indoor or outdoor infestation, this green-colored barn paper sheet is scented to attract insects and is non-toxic for safe use around your home or business.

With an effective duration of up to one full year, these glue traps cover a total surface area of 3600 square inches, making them perfect for residential, commercial, industrial, barns, waste rooms, and animal farms. Designed for use in normal, damp, or humid conditions, this product is part of an intelligent pest management system that keeps your space bug-free without the use of harmful chemicals.

Don't let insects take over your space - arm yourself with the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster and enjoy a pest-free environment today!
